Title: A Letter from Herbert
Text: Dear @^I was wondering if you could do me a favour. Could you return this book to the library for me?^I found it in some foliage and I would return it myself but I'm afraid that I don't have time^As my schedule is extremely full.^I'm sure it will be appreciated if you do.^Thank you.^	-Herbert.

Title: A letter from Herbert
Text: Dear @^I have some free time today, so I was wondering if you'd like to join me for a little reading/studying session later?^I'm thinking about maybe 1pm, if that's fine with you.^If so, meet me in the forest outside Marnie's ranch!^I hope to see you there,^	-Herbert

Title: A letter from Herbert
Text: Dear @^Will you be attending the egg festival this spring? It is my understanding that it will be your first festival here in Pelican Town!^So I thought perhaps you'd like some advice.^Abigail always wins, so try to beat her! But beware, she's tough competition.^Good luck,^	-Herbert

Title: An urgent letter
Text: Dear @^I would like to invite you over to my house for lunch!^Would you come at 1:00pm? There's no need to bring anything apart from your self. If today does not suit you, we can re-arrange for another time if you'd like.^I look forward to seeing you!	-Herbert

Title: A letter from Herbert
Text: Dear @^I don't want to come across as rude or disrespectful in any way, but there's only one vegetable that I really, really dislike.^Rhubarb.^Someone sent me this pie this morning just to spite me for a laugh. I think it was Shane.^Now, I didn't want to put a good pie to waste so I thought maybe you'd like it?^So, here.^ 	-Herbert

Title: A letter from Herbert
Text: Dear @^I cannot even begin to explain how sorry I am after you having to see me in that state yesterday.^I need to explain everything in person, so I'd really appreciate it if you'd meet me for dinner at the saloon?^I'll understand if you don't want to. I've arranged a private room for 7:00pm. I'll wait for you.^But I'll understand if you don't show up.^	-Love Herbert
